column2: "Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Jona hɔ a otsia mprɛnu
column8: na kɔbɔ asɛm a mereka akyerɛ wo yi dawur kyerɛ hɔn."

column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm no tse. Nna Ninive yɛ kurow kɛsenara a wɔnantsew no ndaansa twa."

column2: "Na Jona hyɛɛ ase hɛɛn kurow no mu dze da kor nantsewee
"Na Ninive gyee Nyankopɔn dzii; na wɔbɔɔ mbuadadzi ho dawur
column3: na wofurafuraa eyitam fi hɔn mu akɛse do kesi nkakraba do mpo."

column2: "Na aber a asɛm no kodur Ninive ɔhen asomu no
"Na ɔmaa wɔbɔɔ dawur tahyee Ninive wɔ ɔhen na n’etsitsir no hɔn dzin mu
column6: mmfa hwee nnka hɔn ano: mma wɔnnkɔ edzidzi

column4: na wɔnkeka mu dzendzenndzen mfrɛ Nyankopɔn; ɛhɛɛ
column5: hɔn nyina nsan mfi hɔn kwan bɔn ho
column6: na emimdzi a ɔwɔ hɔn nsamu no ho."

column2: "Sɛ bi a Nyankopɔn bɛsesa n’adwen wɔ dza oesusu dɛ ɔbɛyɛ no ho
"Na Nyankopɔn hun hɔn ndzeyɛɛ dɛ wɔasan efi hɔn kwan bɔn no do; na ɔsesaa n’adwen nuu noho wɔ mbusu a ɔkaa dɛ ɔdze bɔbɔ hɔn no ho; na ɔannyɛ."
